description technical detail:
ViewSonic TD2340 23 inch 10 Point Widescreen Multi Touch IPS Monitor
Exceptional interactivity comes standard in the ViewSonic TD2340, the 23" 10-point multi-touch monitor with 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution, and projected capacitive touch technology delivering seamless and accurate touch response. Experience stunning color performance with IPS technology and a 20,000,000:1 MEGA dynamic contrast ratio. Integrated speakers with SRS premium sound provide a complete multimedia package. DisplayPort, HDMI, VGA inputs provide flexible and convenient connectivity. Advanced dual hinge stand design ensures outstanding ergonomic comfort and productivity. The TD2340 is fully USB HID compliant. It is the gateway to the new world of interactivity.
